content: Singaporean political party The **Most Valuable Party** ([abbreviation](/wiki/Abbreviation): **MVP**) is a political party in Singapore. ## History Most Valuable Party (MVP) founder Chia Yun Kai announced the formation of MVP in April 2025. Chia intended for MVP to contest in East Coast GRC. However, at that time, MVP was not registered as a political party. Chia joined the Singapore Justice Party (SJP) in the lead-up to the 2025 Singapore General Election . He stated that his values align closely with those of the party. As a SJP member, he contested for the Singapore Democratic Alliance in Pasir Ris-Changi GRC. Chia resigned from the SJP on May 4 2025, after the general election, to pursue his own political ambitions with MVP. MVP was officially founded as a political party on December 18 2025, when it was registered under the Registrar of Societies. ## Leadership NoNameYears1Chia Yun Kai2025-*Present*
title: Most Valuable Party
